title: Geez, Even Fargo Has Gone Upscale
description: Visitors to the North Dakota town expecting a scene right out of the movie might be surprised by the James Beard-nominated chefs, Pride flags, hipster boutiques and craft breweries. Oh, and a museum dedicated to the bison.
dc:creator: Danielle Braff
media:credit: Dan Koeck for The New York Times
media:description: The city of Fargo has poured millions into revitalizing its downtown.
